trans-unit.source: Represents a list box control that allows single or multiple item selection.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en liste som tillater én eller flere element-merking.

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Accessibility](#accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction Use the ListBox control to create a list control that allows single or multiple item selection.
trans-unit.target: I dette emnet:- [Introduksjon](#introduction) - [tilgjengelighet](#accessibility) - [deklarerende syntaksen](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduksjon Bruk liste for å opprette en listekontroll som tillater én eller flere element-merking.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.Rows%2A> property to specify the height of the control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.Rows%2A>til å angi høyden på kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: To enable multiple item selection, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property to `ListSelectionMode.Multiple`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil aktivere flervalg elementet, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>egenskapen `ListSelectionMode.Multiple`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify the items that you want to appear in the ListBox control, place a `ListItem` element for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the ListBox control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi elementene som skal vises i listen, kan du plassere et `ListItem` element for hver oppføring mellom innledende og avsluttende koder kontrollens liste.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection to examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> objects contained in the ListBox control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>samlingen å undersøke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>objekter i listen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can determine the selected item(s) in the ListBox control by enumerating the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection and testing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> value for each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> element.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel finne ut de valgte elementene i listen ved å liste opp de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>samlingen og tester den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>verdi for hver <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>element.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ListBox control also supports data binding.
trans-unit.target: Listen støtter også databinding.

trans-unit.source: To bind the control to a data source, first create a data source, such as one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> objects, that contains the items to display in the control.
trans-unit.target: For å binde kontrollen til en datakilde, må du først opprette en datakilde, for eksempel én av de <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>objekter, som inneholder elementer som skal vises i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: Next, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to bind the data source to the ListBox control.
trans-unit.target: Deretter bruker de <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>metode til å binde datakilden til listen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> properties to specify which field in the data source to bind to the `Text` and `Value` properties, respectively, of each list item in the control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>Egenskaper for å angi som feltet i datakilden som skal bindes til det `Text` og `Value` egenskaper henholdsvis for hvert listeelement i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ListBox control will now display the information from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Listen vises nå informasjonen fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Kontrollen kan brukes til å vise brukerinndata, som kan inneholde skadelig klientskript.

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller informasjonen som ble sendt fra en klient for kjørbare skript, SQL-setninger eller annen kode før det blir vist i programmet.

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke validering Kontroller bekrefte brukerinndata før den angitte teksten i en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET gir et inndataforespørselen valideringsfunksjonen til å blokkere skript og HTML i brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [sikre standardkontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [slik: beskytte mot skriptet utnytter i et webprogram ved å bruke HTML-koding til strenger](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), og [validering brukerinndata i ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: ## Tilgjengelighet For informasjon om hvordan du konfigurerer denne kontrollen, slik at den genererer markup som overholder tilgjengelighet standarder se [tilgjengelighet i Visual Studio og ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```              ```
trans-unit.target: ## Deklarerende syntaks.```              ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette og starte en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Adds <xref uid="langword_csharp_name" name="name" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_size" name="size" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_multiple" name="multiple" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_onchange" name="onchange" href=""></xref> to the list of attributes to render.
trans-unit.target: Legger til <xref uid="langword_csharp_name" name="name" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_size" name="size" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_multiple" name="multiple" href=""> </xref>, og <xref uid="langword_csharp_onchange" name="onchange" href=""> </xref> i listen over attributter til å gjengi.

trans-unit.source: The output stream that renders HTML content to the client.
trans-unit.target: Output-dataflyten som gjengir HTML-innhold til klienten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjefargen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> object that represents the border color of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> objektet som representerer kantlinjefargen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller Angir kantlinjestilen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width for the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjetykkelsen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"></xref> object that represents the border width of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit"> </xref> objektet som representerer kantlinjetykkelse for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the array of index values for currently selected items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en rekke verdier for valgte elementer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the GetSelectedIndices method to identify or access the selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden GetSelectedIndices til å identifisere eller få tilgang til de valgte elementene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Each element in the returned array represents the index for a selected list item.
trans-unit.target: Hvert element i den returnerte matrisen representerer indeksen for et merket listeelement.

trans-unit.source: You can use the index values to access the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke indeksverdiene tilgang til elementer i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of integers, each representing the index of a selected item in the list box.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med heltall, hver som representerer indeksen for et merket element i listen.

trans-unit.source: Loads the posted content of the list control, if it is different from the last posting.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn postede innholdet kontrollens listen hvis den er forskjellig fra den siste posteringen.

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method is used primarily by control developers, when deriving a custom control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadPostData brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere når det avledes en egendefinert kontroll fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method indicates if the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Angir metoden LoadPostData Hvis tilstanden til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>kontrollen er endret.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: In other words, it determines if each list item in the control has the same <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> value as the last posted value.
trans-unit.target: Med andre ord, den bestemmer om hvert listeelement kontrollens har samme <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>verdi som den siste verdien i postede.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>

trans-unit.source: A user selecting an item in the control changes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> value for the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: En bruker velger et element i kontrollen endres av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>verdien for den tilsvarende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>objekt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>

trans-unit.source: If some list items are selected in the control, or if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> is disabled, LoadPostData returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis noen listeelementer er valgt i kontrollen, eller hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>er deaktivert, LoadPostData returnerer `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: When the LoadPostData method returns `true` for a control, the ASP.NET page framework invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method for the control.
trans-unit.target: Når metoden LoadPostData returnerer `true` ASP.NET siden framework aktiverer for en kontroll av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>metode for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control, used to index the `postCollection`.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkel-ID for kontrollen som brukes til indeks i `postCollection`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"></xref> that contains value information indexed by control identifiers.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om verdi indekseres av kontrollen identifikatorer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the posted content is different from the last posting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis postede innholdet, er forskjellig fra den siste posteringen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox"></xref> control prior to rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox"> </xref> kontrollen før gjengivelse på klienten.

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method is used primarily by control developers, when deriving a custom control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPreRender brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere når det avledes en egendefinert kontroll fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method allows derived classes to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPreRender tillater avledede klasser til å håndtere den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>hendelsen uten å knytte representant.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method performs any necessary prerendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPreRender utfører alle nødvendige prerendering trinnene før lagring visningsstatus og gjengivelse innholdet for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>objekt som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged*> method whenever posted data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox"></xref> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged*>metoden når lagt ut data for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox"> </xref> kontrollen er endret.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged*>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method is used primarily by control developers, when deriving a custom control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaisePostDataChangedEvent brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere når det avledes en egendefinert kontroll fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET page framework calls the RaisePostDataChangedEvent method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.LoadPostData%2A> method indicates that the state of the list items have changed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET siden framework kaller RaisePostDataChangedEvent-metoden på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>kontrollerer når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.LoadPostData%2A>metoden indikerer at tilstanden til elementene er endret i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.LoadPostData%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A> method to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Metodekall RaisePostDataChangedEvent den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>metode til å øke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A> method to perform custom processing when the user selects list items in the control.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere kan overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>metode til å utføre egendefinerte behandling når brukeren velger listeelementer i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method can optionally perform validation before raising the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> event for the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaisePostDataChangedEvent kan eventuelt utføre før du opprettet i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged>hendelsen for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: To validate a group of controls on the page when a list item within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> is selected, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A> properties to `true`, and then specify the group of controls to validate in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ikke validere gruppe vises på siden når et listeelement i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>er merket, angitt av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A>egenskapene som skal `true`, og angi deretter gruppen for å validere i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of rows displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir antall rader som vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Rows property to specify the number of rows to display in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen rader til å angi hvor mange rader som skal vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The number of rows must be between one and 2000.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Antallet rader må være mellom et og 2000.

trans-unit.source: Values outside of this range will raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: Verdier utenfor dette området som vil utløse et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Rows property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for rader som er lagret i visningen tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_4" name="4" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_4" name="4" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified number of rows is less than one or greater than 2000.
trans-unit.target: Det angitte antallet rader som er mindre enn én eller flere enn 2000.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the selection mode of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir valgmodusen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectionMode property to specify the mode behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SelectionMode-egenskapen til å angi virkemåten modus for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `ListSelectionMode.Single` indicates only a single item can be selected from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control, while `ListSelectionMode.Multiple` specifies multiple items can be selected.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen settes `ListSelectionMode.Single` angir bare ett element kan velges fra det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>kontroll, mens `ListSelectionMode.Multiple` angir flere elementer kan velges.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The value of the SelectionMode property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for SelectionMode om det er lagret i visningen tilstand.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListSelectionMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListSelectionMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Single" name="Single" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_Single" name="Single" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified selection mode is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListSelectionMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte valgmodusen er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListSelectionMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Loads the posted content of the list control, if it is different from the last posting.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn postede innholdet kontrollens listen hvis den er forskjellig fra den siste posteringen.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to process posted data for changes to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> object.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, bør du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å behandle postede data etter endringer i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Metoden IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The index within the posted collection that references the content to load.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen i samlingen postede som refererer til innholdet for å laste inn.

trans-unit.source: The collection posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen på serveren.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the posted content is different from the last posting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis postede innholdet, er forskjellig fra den siste posteringen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged*> method whenever posted data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox"></xref> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged*>metoden når lagt ut data for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox"> </xref> kontrollen er endret.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged*>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to raise an event when the posted data for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> object changes.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, bør du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å opprette en hendelse når postede data for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>objekt endringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.System%23Web%23UI%23IPostBackDataHandler%23LoadPostData%2A> method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.System%23Web%23UI%23IPostBackDataHandler%23LoadPostData%2A>metoden er en eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem implementering.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox.System%23Web%23UI%23IPostBackDataHandler%23LoadPostData%2A>

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>
